snippet.title: Scrapping Simulator [OFFICIAL] Trailer - May 2021
snippet.description:
Hi All,

Get Scrapping Simulator Today! - A LowPoly FPS Simulator where you dismantle electronics to gain raw metals like copper, silver & gold ect, you can buy a furnace with the in-game currency you earn by selling your raw materials to create Ingots, which you can either collect or Sell for a larger margin than their weight in raw metal form, you can also purchase upgrades to make your eWaste dismantling a lot faster. If this interests you, you can checkout the Steam Store Page Below: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/14...​
